title: Sausage, sweet potato and broccoli traybake
description: Let the oven do the work in this easy one-pan wonder. Roasting broccoli gives it a delicious nutty flavour.
ingredients: 1 small sweet potato (about 150g/5½oz), cut into 2.5cm/1in cubes
pinch dried chilli flakes, to taste
1 small broccoli head (about 150g/5½oz), cut into large florets
salt and freshly ground black pepper
